snippet: Jairisa Galindo, 18, who was struck by a car as she pulled a toddler in a wagon, died one day after the crash, the authorities said.
abstract: Jairisa Galindo dies at hospital from injuries suffered in southern New Jersey accident that took life of her 2-year-old son; Galindo was struck by car as she pulled Martinez in wagon; two other children are in critical but stable condition; no charges are pending.
lead_paragraph: Jairisa Galindo, 18, who was struck by a car as she pulled a toddler in a wagon, died one day after the crash, the authorities said.

headline.main: Woman Dies After Car Hits Wagon in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Woman, 18, Dies After Wagon Is Hit
